TextView.android:text: Safety Audit Form
Building Name:
Rating (Score):

A - Does not comply (0),
B - Complied with serious issue (1),
C - Complied with minor issue (1.5), &
D - Complied (2.5)
I. Car Inside
1. Emergency and Safety equipment are functional.\n(Such as alarm, Car lights, Light curtain, STOP Switch etc.,)
2. Capacity plate and safety instructions provided and clearly visible.
3. All applicable service signages, safety stickers / warning signs are fixed.
II. Machine room
4. Access ladder to Machine room is safe and hand rail are provided.
5. Machine room lighting are adequate and safe.
6. All the Electrical Panels are covered, wired neatly and Safe.
7. Earthing terminal correctly fixed and grounding available.
8. Machine room is free from Trip or fall hazards and lockable Condition.
9. Machine room is clean and ventilators provided.
10. Machine room openings are covered and secured from falling objects.
11. Controller and ARD are covered and locked.
12. All applicable guards are in place and warning signs fixed.
13. Brake condition and operation are safe and satisfactory.
14. Manual Rescue procedure is displayed and accessories are available and functional condition.
15. ARD is in working Condition. (If available)
16. Thimble rods / Eye bolts are secured with lock nuts and split pins.
III. Shaft
17. Shaft lighting up to pit are Adequate and safe, having good illumination.
18. Low overhead identified, marked / protected.
19. Landing door Mechanical locking and Unlocking mechanisms are in Working Condition at ALL levels.
20. Main rope and Governor rope are in good condition ( No strand cut ) - Visual check.
21. Filler weight anti jump, CWT arrester properly fixed.
22. All the safety circuits are in function without bypass. Such as landing door, Car door, final limit, pit switches, safety gear switches, tension pulley switches etc.
IV. CAR TOP
23. Car top light & fan is safe, protected and working.
24. Car top barricades are in place and firmly fitted.
25. Car top and Cwt Top - Applicable guards are in place.
26. Car top earth wires are connected.
27. All car top switches and inspection buttons are in good condition and working in order. (MTN box switches Not struck and smooth functional)
28. Car Top is neat and Clean and meets '5 S'
V. Pit
29. Traveling Cables are fitted properly and Secured Safely.
30. CWT screen correctly set to cover buffer and buffer clearence is acceptable.
31. Pit switches are in place and functional - Verify.
32. Pit ladder fitted correctly in its location and safe.
33. Compensation Chains are fitted properly and Secured Safely.
34. Pit is Clean and Clear from materials.
VI. Tools & Process
35. All applicable tools are available and in good condition.
36. Electrical safety practice (Switching ON and OFF Method) is followed properly.
37. While working at Car top and machine room, mobile not in use.
38. Door stopper and hand lamp available.
39. Car Top Entry and Exit procedures are followed properly and verified.
40. Pit Entry and Exit procedures are followed properly and verified.
All Observations:
Work Completed By
Engineer Name
Conducted On
Engineer Signature
